trans-unit.source: Manages asynchronous [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] serializers and type converters.
trans-unit.target: Gere assíncrona [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] serializers e conversores de tipo.

trans-unit.source: XpsSerializationManagerAsync manages asynchronous serializers and type converters that write content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: XpsSerializationManagerAsync gere serializers assíncronos e conversores de tipo que escrever conteúdo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> manages synchronous serializers and type converters that write content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>Gere serializers síncronas e conversores de tipo que escrever conteúdo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManagerAsync"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManagerAsync"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different parts of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece métodos para a aquisição de leitores de serialização e escritores para as diferentes partes de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify batch mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para especificar o modo de batch caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
Cancela uma operação de serialização assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes and writes all buffered data as output.
trans-unit.target: Consolida todas as alterações e escreve todos os dados colocados em memória intermédia como saída.

trans-unit.source: Saves a specified serialized object to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: Guarda um objecto serializado especificado para um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacote.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a serialization operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre após a conclusão de uma operação de serialização.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use event handlers, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como utilizar processadores de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
